availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert Fields (Union County, Tennessee, farmer and merchant. )

body.p: Union County, Tennessee, farmer and merchant. Tennessee native. Son of Phebe Fields. Married to Amanda Hubbs Fields in Grainger County on January 10, 1850. Father of Eliot O. Fields, Alonzo Fields, Melissa Fields, and Rasmus Fields. Farmer in Grainger County, Tennessee, in 1850. Merchant in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Grainger County, District 14, p.118B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Union County, District 4, p. 444.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Anna , p. 392B.
Tennessee State Marriages, 1780-2002, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN, p. 488 of 1,656 on microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
